page.title: 15Village Organisations
page.content: {Groups in Cropthorne. { {The Women's Institute}meet monthly and have speakers on a number of topics. Extra courses are available in Arts and Crafts. This branch has a choir. {An Adult Village Choir}practises weekly and sings in the church on occasions. Their social group arranges outings to concerts and the theatre. {Members of the Flower Guild}decorate the Church on a weekly rota, but all contribute to the floral display at the Annual Walkabout, as do the {Local Artists and Craftsmen}skilled in painting, paper sculpture, calligraphy, glass engraving, and woodcarving. Some of these craftsmen hold classas independently in the area.
